duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care, including administering medications, treatments, and interventions as prescribed by the healthcare provider.
Assess, monitor, and document patient conditions and progress, communicating findings to the healthcare team.
Collaborate with other healthcare professionals to develop and implement individualized care plans.
Utilize electronic medical record (EMR) systems to input patient data, maintain accurate records, and ensure continuity of care.
Educate patients and their families on disease management, treatment plans, and preventative care measures.
Adhere to legal, ethical, and professional standards, maintaining confidentiality and upholding patient rights.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (BSN) or Associate's degree in Nursing (ADN)
